item.title: [Game Boy] GameOfLifeKuzushi
item.description: Game Of Life Kusushi Game of Life Kuzushi is a homebrew game for Game Boy, that mixes Conway’s Game of Life, with a block breaker game. Unlike in regular block breaker games, here cells evolve periodically, following Conway’s Game of Life rules: Any live cell with two or three live neighbors lives on to the next generation. Any live cell with fewer than two or more than three live neighbors dies.
